PackageOracle.name: DA_ACCOUNT_PURPOSE_SUBTYPE
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_ACCOUNT_PURPOSE_SUBTYPE
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.36.777431000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,account_purpose_subtype_cd IN VARCHAR2
,account_purpose_subtype_desc IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,account_purpose_subtype_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_account_purpose_subtype;

body.name: DA_ACCOUNT_PURPOSE_SUBTYPE
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_ACCOUNT_PURPOSE_SUBTYPE
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.36.787858000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,account_purpose_subtype_cd IN VARCHAR2
,account_purpose_subtype_desc IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_account_purpose_subtype.add, parms=' || account_purpose_subtype_cd || '|' || account_purpose_subtype_desc || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_account_purpose_subtype a
(
a.account_purpose_subtype_cd
,a.account_purpose_subtype_desc
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.account_purpose_subtype_cd
,add.account_purpose_subtype_desc
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_account_purpose_subtype.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,account_purpose_subtype_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_account_purpose_subtype.del, parms=' || account_purpose_subtype_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_account_purpose_subtype a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.account_purpose_subtype_cd = del.account_purpose_subtype_cd
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_account_purpose_subtype.del');

END del;

END da_account_purpose_subtype;
